settings.title: Ship's Settings
settings.saveFailed: Failed to secure the harbor, arr!
settings.restartFailed: Vessel won't restart, shiver me timbers!
settings.aboutTitle: About the creator of this vessel, arr!
update.title: Ship's Upgrade
update.noUpdate: Ye be sailin' with the finest edition already!
update.newVersionAvailable: A finer edition be available: v{version}
common.title: Name
alert.tryRestartingServer: Try restartin' the vessel and hoist the sails again.
alert.variableUsername: The Twitch name o' the scallywag who triggered the signal.
alert.variableUserDisplayName: The Twitch display name o' the buccaneer who triggered the signal.
alert.variableRewardTitle: The name o' the custom booty claimed.
alert.variableRewardCost: The doubloons fer the custom booty claimed.
alert.variableUserInput: The message provided by the scallywag when claimin' the booty.
redeems.inStockInfo: Shows whether the booty be in the hold.
redeems.enabledInfo: This shows whether the booty be ready. Crew sees only ready booty.
redeems.pausedInfo: This determines whether to hold the booty. Crew can't claim paused booty.
redeems.isUserInputRequired: Does the scallywag need to speak up?
redeems.isUserInputRequiredInfo: This determines whether pirates must provide information to claim the booty. Change the orders field to customize what ye need.
redeems.shouldRedemptionsBeSkippedInfo: This determines whether claims should be marked FULFILLED immediately when booty be claimed. If unchecked, status be set to UNFULFILLED and follows the normal queue process.
redeems.maxPerStreamInfo: The maximum claims allowed per live voyage. The minimum value be 1.
redeems.maxPerUserPerStreamInfo: The maximum claims allowed per pirate per voyage. The minimum value be 1.
redeems.globalCooldownInfo: The global waitin' period fer all claims. The minimum value be 1.
redeems.notEditableWarning: Twitch won't let ye edit booty that weren't created usin' this vessel. Ye can still add shanties to this Twitch booty, but other riggin' must be changed on Twitch.
redeems.editableWarning: Ye can edit this booty 'cause it were created usin' this ship
redeems.deleteRewardConfirmation: Arrr ye sure ye want to send this custom booty {rewardTitle} to Davy Jones' locker? This action can't be undone!
redeems.titleRequired: Name be required to create new booty
redeems.costRequired: Doubloons must be a positive number to create new booty
redeems.rewardCreated: Booty created successfully on Twitch, arr!
redeems.rewardUpdated: Booty updated successfully on Twitch, arr!
redeems.saveFailed: Failed to save booty to Twitch, shiver me timbers!
redeems.settingsSaveFailed: Failed to save signal riggin' locally, arr!
redeems.rewardDeleted: Booty sent to Davy Jones from Twitch!
redeems.deleteFailed: Failed to send booty to Davy Jones on Twitch!
redeems.startingNewReward: Ye can edit the new booty now, then stow it usin' the Stow button at the bottom o' the panel.
redeems.fetchCustomRewardsFailed: Error plunderin' custom booty from Twitch
twitchChat.connected: Connected to the Twitch crow's nest, arr!
twitchChat.disconnected: Disconnected from the Twitch crow's nest.
twitchChat.loadCacheFailed: Failed to load cached parley and booty claims
twitchChat.checkConnectionFailed: Failed to check Twitch crow's nest connection status
